hero.headline: Digital Experience & Growth Leader
hero.subhead: Driving compounding growth through disciplined experimentation and orchestrated delivery.

snapshots.methodology: Sequenced CRO, CRM, and search sprints anchored on RICE scoring.
Unified first-party data and rebuilt MMM with Bayesian priors.
Introduced dual-track discovery with weekly journey clinics.
Scaled content ops with semantic clustering and automation.

impacts: Launched a modular experimentation program that accelerated release cadence by 3×.
Rebuilt lifecycle segmentation, lifting repeat purchase share by 18%.
Shipped AI-assisted merchandising that reduced out-of-stock incidents by 26%.
Established revenue operations pod increasing SQL velocity by 41%.
Forged ABM playbook yielding 3.2× enterprise ACV uplift.
Operationalized win/loss intelligence driving 12-point retention swing.
Delivered unified design system reducing launch time by 45%.
Introduced personalization framework boosting ad yield by 28%.
Scaled editorial analytics, powering a 2.6× content velocity increase.
Guided product-market fit loops culminating in 1.9× conversion lift.
Expanded supply-side acquisition delivering 6× city footprint growth.
Raised Series A with evidence-backed growth thesis and LTV clarity.

caseStudies.title: Commerce Replatform & CRO Engine
caseStudies.problem: Legacy checkout leaks stalled margin growth.
caseStudies.approach: Sequenced modular rollout with dual-track discovery.

caseStudies.title: Merch Intelligence Stack
caseStudies.problem: Buyers lacked visibility into SKU performance.
caseStudies.approach: Deployed predictive inventory scoring and alerts.

caseStudies.title: Lifecycle Automation Reset
caseStudies.approach: Rebuilt segmentation and dynamic content system.

caseStudies.title: Revenue Operations Spine
caseStudies.problem: Fragmented funnel analytics limited growth spend.
caseStudies.approach: Centralized data model with live health scoring.

caseStudies.title: Enterprise ABM Plays
caseStudies.approach: Launched account pods with orchestrated signals.

caseStudies.title: Marketplace Liquidity Flywheel
caseStudies.problem: Two-sided activation lagged in new markets.
caseStudies.approach: Built liquidity scoring and localized GTM kits.

bioShort: Digital growth partner blending experimentation, brand, and ops to compound enterprise value.
